trans-unit.source: Transforms XML data using an XSLT style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Transforma os dados XML através de uma folha de estilo XSLT.

trans-unit.source: The XslCompiledTransform class is an XSLT processor that supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: A classe de XslCompiledTransform é um processador XSLT que suporte a sintaxe de XSLT 1.0.

trans-unit.source: It is a new implementation and includes performance gains when compared to the obsolete <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: É uma nova implementação e inclui ganhos de desempenho quando comparado com o obsoleto <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The structure of the XslCompiledTransform class is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura da classe XslCompiledTransform é muito semelhante para a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method loads and compiles the style sheet, while the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method executes the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>método carrega e compila o estilo de folha, enquanto o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>método executa a transformação XSLT.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Suporte para o XSLT `document()` blocos de script incorporado e função estão desativados por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: These features can be enabled by creating an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings> object and passing it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Estas funcionalidades podem ser ativadas criando um <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>objeto e passou-a para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [utilizando a classe de XslCompiledTransform](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [migrar da classe de XslTransform o](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Security Considerations When creating an application that uses the XslCompiledTransform class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications: - XSLT scripting is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Segurança considerações ao criar uma aplicação que utiliza a classe de XslCompiledTransform, deve ter em consideração os seguintes itens e as implicações:-XSLT scripting está desativada por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment.
trans-unit.target: XSLT scripting deve ser ativada apenas se necessitar de suporte de scripts e estiver a trabalhar num ambiente totalmente fidedigno.

trans-unit.source: - The XSLT `document()` function is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: -O XSLT `document()` função está desativada por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: If you enable the `document()` function, restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se ativar o `document()` funcionar, restringir os recursos que podem ser acedidos através da transmissão de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>de objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>

trans-unit.source: - Extension objects are enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: -Objetos extensão são ativados por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> object containing extension objects is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method, they are utilized.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>é transmitido um objeto que contém objetos de extensão para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>método, são utilizados.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>

trans-unit.source: - XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: -Folhas de estilo XSLT podem incluir referências a outros ficheiros e blocos de script incorporado.

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador mal intencionado pode explorar esta fornecendo, com dados ou de folhas de estilos que quando executado pode fazer com que o sistema para processar até que o computador que executa baixo nos recursos.

trans-unit.source: - XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing.
trans-unit.target: -Aplicações de XSLT que são executadas num ambiente misto de fidedignidade podem resultar em spoofing de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method and executes the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um utilizador mal intencionado pode carregar um objeto com uma folha de estilo prejudicial e entregam para outro utilizador, subsequentemente, chama o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>método e executa a transformação.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: These security issues can be mitigated by not enabling scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source, and by not accepting XslCompiledTransform objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from an untrusted source.
trans-unit.target: Estes problemas de segurança podem ser mitigados ao ativar o não processamento de scripts ou o `document()` funcione, a menos que a folha de estilo provém de uma origem fidedigna e, por não aceitar XslCompiledTransform objetos, folhas de estilo XSLT ou XML origem de dados a partir de uma origem não fidedigna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"></xref> class with the specified debug setting.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform"> </xref> classe com a definição de depuração especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met in order to step into the code and debug the style sheet: - The `enableDebug` parameter is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes condições devem ser cumpridas para avance para o código e a folha de estilos de depuração: - `enableDebug` parâmetro está definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: - The style sheet is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method either as a URI, or an implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: -A folha de estilos é passada para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>método como um URI ou uma implementação do <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>classe que implementa o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>interface.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface is implemented on all text-parsing <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>interface é implementada em todos os texto análise <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objetos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the style sheet is loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object, such as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> implementation that does not implement the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface, you cannot debug the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, se a folha de estilos é carregada a utilizar um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>objeto, tal como um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>ou <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, ou um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>implementação que não implementa o <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>interface, não é possível depurar a folha de estilos.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> used to load the style sheet is a file-based <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> (this is the default <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class).
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>utilizada para carregar o estilo de folha é um ficheiro com base em <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, tais como o <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>(esta é a predefinição <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>utilizado pelo <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>classe).</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: - The style sheet is located on the local machine or on the intranet.
trans-unit.target: -A folha de estilo está localizada no computador local ou na intranet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to generate debug information; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para gerar informações de depuração caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> enables you to debug the style sheet with the Microsoft Visual Studio Debugger.
trans-unit.target: Definir este como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> permite-lhe depurar a folha de estilo com o depurador do Microsoft Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Compiles an XSLT style sheet to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: Compila uma folha de estilos XSLT para um tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `xsltc.exe` tool is a wrapper around the CompileToType method.
trans-unit.target: O `xsltc.exe` ferramenta é um wrapper em torno o método CompileToType.

trans-unit.source: Compiling style sheets with the `xsltc.exe` will meet the demands of most applications that leverage the use of compiled style sheets.
trans-unit.target: As folhas de estilos com a compilar o `xsltc.exe` irá satisfazer os pedidos de maioria das aplicações que tiram partido da utilização de folhas em estilo compilada.

trans-unit.source: The CompileToType method should be used when building custom compilation tools.
trans-unit.target: O método CompileToType deve ser utilizado ao criar as ferramentas de compilação personalizado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> positioned at the beginning of the style sheet to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>posicionado no início da folha de estilo a serem compilados.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"></xref> to be applied to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings"> </xref> seja aplicada a folha de estilos.

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default*> will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Se este for <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, a <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default*>serão aplicadas.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> use to resolve style sheet modules referenced in <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:import" name="xsl:import" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:include" name="xsl:include" href=""></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> utilizar para resolver os módulos de folha de estilo referenciados no <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:import" name="xsl:import" href=""> </xref> e <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsl:include" name="xsl:include" href=""> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, external resources will not be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Se este for <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, não será resolvidos recursos externos.

trans-unit.source: Setting this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> enables debugging the style sheet with a debugger.
trans-unit.target: Definir este como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> ativa a depuração de folha de estilos com um depurador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder> used for the style sheet compilation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>utilizado para a compilação de folha de estilo.</xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The provided TypeBuilder is used to generate the resulting type.
trans-unit.target: O TypeBuilder fornecido é utilizado para gerar o tipo resultante.

trans-unit.source: The base path for the assemblies generated for <xref uid="langword_csharp_msxsl:script" name="msxsl:script" href=""></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de base para as assemblagens geradas para <xref uid="langword_csharp_msxsl:script" name="msxsl:script" href=""> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: If only one script assembly is generated, this parameter specifies the path for that assembly.
trans-unit.target: Se apenas é gerada uma assemblagem de script, este parâmetro especifica o caminho para essa assemblagem.

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple script assemblies, a distinctive suffix will be appended to the file name to ensure uniqueness of assembly names.
trans-unit.target: Em caso de múltiplas assemblagens de script, um sufixo distinctive será acrescentado ao nome do ficheiro para garantir a exclusividade de nomes de assemblagem.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> object containing compiler errors and warnings that indicate the results of the compilation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"> </xref> objeto que contém erros do compilador e avisos que indicam os resultados da compilação.

trans-unit.source: Loads and compiles the style sheet located at the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: Carrega e compila a folha de estilo, localizada no URI especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>classe suporta a sintaxe de XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: A folha de estilo XSLT tem de utilizar o `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to resolve the style sheet URI, and process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: Este método tem o seguinte comportamento: - um <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>a nenhum utilizador credenciais é utilizado para resolver a URI de folha de estilos e processar qualquer `xsl:import` ou `xsl:include` elementos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with default settings is used to load the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: -Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>com predefinição definições é utilizado para carregar a folha de estilos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: DTD processing is disabled on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: O processamento DTD está desativado no <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If you require DTD processing, create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with this feature enabled, and pass it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se necessitar de processamento DTD, crie um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>com esta funcionalidade ativada e transmiti-lo para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The `document()` function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: -O `document()` função está desativada.

trans-unit.source: - Embedded scripts are not supported.
trans-unit.target: -Scripts incorporados não são suportadas.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29> overload to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>sobrecarga para especificar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>com as credenciais de autenticação necessário ou para especificar definições diferentes das XSLT.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>

trans-unit.target: O URI da folha de estilo.

trans-unit.target: The stylesheetUri value is .

trans-unit.target: A folha de estilos contém um erro.

trans-unit.target: Não é possível localizar a folha de estilos.

trans-unit.source: The stylesheetUri value includes a filename or directory that cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: O stylesheetUri valor inclui um nome de ficheiro ou diretório que não é possível encontrar.

trans-unit.target: O stylesheetUri valor não pode ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: -or- An error occurred while processing the request.
trans-unit.target: - ou - Ocorreu um erro ao processar o pedido.

trans-unit.target: stylesheetUriNão é um URI válido.

trans-unit.source: There was a parsing error loading the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro de análise ao carregar a folha de estilos.

trans-unit.source: Loads the compiled style sheet that was created using the [XSLT Compiler (xsltc.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Carrega a folha de estilos compilada que foi criada utilizando o [XSLT compilador (xsltc.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The xsltc.exe tool is used to compile style sheets and generate assemblies from the style sheets.
trans-unit.target: A ferramenta de xsltc.exe é utilizada para compilar folhas de estilo e gerar assemblagens de folhas de estilo.

trans-unit.source: The Load method loads the compiled style sheet from the assembly.
trans-unit.target: O método de carregamento carrega a folha de estilos compilada da assemblagem.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must also include the XSLT assembly as a reference in your application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Também tem de incluir a assemblagem XSLT como uma referência na sua aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The name of the class that contains the compiled style sheet.
trans-unit.target: O nome da classe que contém a folha de estilos compilada.

trans-unit.source: This is usually the name of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, este é o nome da folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified, the xsltc.exe tool uses the name of the style sheet for the class and assembly names.
trans-unit.target: Salvo especificação em contrário, a ferramenta de xsltc.exe utiliza o nome da folha de estilo para os nomes de classe e assemblagem.

trans-unit.source: Compiles the style sheet contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Compila a folha de estilo contida no <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>classe suporta a sintaxe de XSLT 1.0.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: A folha de estilo XSLT tem de utilizar o `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The style sheet loads from the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> through all its children.
trans-unit.target: A folha de estilo carrega a partir do nó atual do <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>através de todos os respectivos valores secundários.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe utilizar uma parte de um documento como a folha de estilos.

trans-unit.source: After the Load method completes, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: Depois de concluir o método de carregamento, a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>está posicionado no nó seguinte após o fim da folha de estilo.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: If the end of the document is reached, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned at the end of file (EOF).
trans-unit.target: Se for atingido o fim do documento, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>está posicionado o fim do ficheiro (EOF).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: Este método tem o seguinte comportamento: - um <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>com nenhum utilizador credenciais é utilizada para processar qualquer `xsl:import` ou `xsl:include` elementos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>sobrecarga para especificar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>com as credenciais de autenticação necessário ou para especificar definições diferentes das XSLT.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que contém a folha de estilos.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.target: The stylesheet value is .

trans-unit.target: A folha de estilos contém um erro.

trans-unit.source: Compiles the style sheet contained in the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>interface está implementada a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>classes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: Estas classes representam uma cache de memória dos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>classe baseia-se no W3C documento Object Model (DOM) e inclui capacidades de edição.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>classe é um arquivo de dados só de leitura com base no modelo de dados XPath.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>a classe recomendada para o XSLT é processar.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um desempenho mais rápido quando comparado com a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>classe.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformações de aplicam o documento como um todo.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, se passar num nó diferente do nó de raiz do documento, este não impede que o processo de transformação aceder a todos os nós no documento de carregar.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Transformar um fragmento de nó, tem de criar um objeto que contenha apenas o fragmento de nó e passar o objeto para o método de transformação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: transformar um fragmento de nó](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> (typically an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>), or an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> containing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: No Microsoft .NET Framework, isto pode ser um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> (normalmente, um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>), ou um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> que contém os dados para ser transformados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>interface está implementada a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>classes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: Estas classes representam uma cache de memória dos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>classe baseia-se no W3C documento Object Model (DOM) e inclui capacidades de edição.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>classe é um arquivo de dados só de leitura com base no modelo de dados XPath.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>a classe recomendada para o XSLT é processar.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um desempenho mais rápido quando comparado com a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>classe.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformações de aplicam o documento como um todo.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, se passar num nó diferente do nó de raiz do documento, este não impede que o processo de transformação aceder a todos os nós no documento de carregar.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Transformar um fragmento de nó, tem de criar um objeto que contenha apenas o fragmento de nó e passar o objeto para o método de transformação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: transformar um fragmento de nó](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> overload which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as the input argument.
trans-unit.target: Se a folha de estilos compilada incluído o `xsl:strip-space` elemento, tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>sobrecarga que demora um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>como o argumento de entrada.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>interface está implementada a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>e <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>classes.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: Estas classes representam uma cache de memória dos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>classe baseia-se no W3C documento Object Model (DOM) e inclui capacidades de edição.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>classe é um arquivo de dados só de leitura com base no modelo de dados XPath.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>a classe recomendada para o XSLT é processar.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um desempenho mais rápido quando comparado com a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>classe.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: Transformações de aplicam o documento como um todo.

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: Por outras palavras, se passar num nó diferente do nó de raiz do documento, este não impede que o processo de transformação aceder a todos os nós no documento de carregar.

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the Transform method.
trans-unit.target: Transformar um fragmento de nó, tem de criar um objeto que contenha apenas o fragmento de nó e passar o objeto para o método de transformação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: transformar um fragmento de nó](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> (typically an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>), or an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> containing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: No Microsoft .NET Framework, isto pode ser um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> (normalmente, um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>), ou um <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> que contém os dados para ser transformados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"></xref> containing the namespace-qualified arguments used as input to the transform.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de espaço de nomes qualificado utilizados como entrada para a transformação.

trans-unit.source: This value can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este valor pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>ao qual pretende de saída.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains an `xsl:output` element, you should create the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object returned from the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings*> property.
trans-unit.target: Se a folha de estilos contém uma `xsl:output` elemento, deve criar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>utilizando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>objeto devolvido do <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings*>propriedade.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings*> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> has the correct output settings.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>tem as definições corretas de saída.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>
